languages.english-overview:
PASTE is an open source pastebin forked from the original pastebin.com script.
It's complete with a brand new design and features such as password protected pastes, archives, custom templates and much more still to come.
PASTE is released under the GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE.
languages.english-exp_ad_pass: New password. Leave blank if you do not want to reset the password
languages.english-err_no_username: Please provide the username to reset the password
languages.english-err_no_such_user: The Admin username is incorrect and does not exist!
languages.english-no_pass_encrypt: Could not encrypt admin password because the domain is not pointing to the correct server
